td.span:
We thank you for your valued Purchase Order No.
dated . We are pleased to acknowledge and confirm your order as per the details below. This Sales Order Acknowledgement outlines the agreed items, pricing, and estimated delivery schedule.

t.t-foreach: doc.order_line.filtered(lambda l: not l.is_downpayment).sorted(key=lambda p: tuple(int(x) for x in (p.sl_no or '0').split('.')))

span.span:
Kindly review the following for your confirmation. If no discrepancies are reported within 2 working days, the order will be considered confirmed for processing and delivery.
Remarks:
This order will be processed in line with the terms mentioned above.
In case of any change in delivery schedule or pricing, you will be informed promptly.
Please confirm receipt and acceptance of this Sales Order Acknowledgement.

div.style: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: flex-start; padding-top: 15px;

td.div: A professional Supplier and Service provider for All Electrical & Instrumentation, Automation& Control, Fire & Safety, Navigation and Communication and Calibration requirements for Marine, Oil & Gas and Energy Industry.
